traceability.evidence: - bin/dry-aged-deps.js: No code to read or parse `.dry-aged-deps.json` (search for fs.readFile or JSON.parse of config file returns no matches). - README.md: No section or example demonstrating `.dry-aged-deps.json` configuration file format or usage. - No JSON schema file present in repository; no tests for config file parsing, merging, or validation found. - Tests directory does not contain any tests covering config file functionality.
traceability.notes: The specification for configuration file support has not been implemented. There is no code to locate, read, validate, or merge `.dry-aged-deps.json` settings, no documentation updates, no JSON schema, and no tests. All acceptance criteria remain unmet.
